bibl.title: Letter from John R. Bullard to Philip Showalter Hench, June 21, 1941

div1.p: Bullard provides Hench with dates for the photographs which he had sent.

div1.head: Letter from John R. Bullard to Philip Showalter Hench, June 21, 1941
div1.opener:
St. Augustine, Florida.
June 21, 1941.
JRB
Dear Dr. Hench:
div1.p:
Thanks for yours of the
18th and the copy of the splendid address
you made before the A. M. A. at Cleveland.

I am sorry for having
omitted dates on my photographs
and would trouble you to mark the
one in the shell: Harvard Varsity
crews of 1894, 1895, and 1896; Captain in
1895 and 1896. And the other photo-
graph: September, 1901.
div1.closer:
Sincerely, John R. Bullard. Dr. Philip S. Hench,
The Mayo Clinic,
Rochester, Minnesota.
